SmUtilities

Class TextFileWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • SmUtilities.TextFileWriter

  • public class TextFileWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to write an array of text out to a file

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextFileWriter(java.nio.file.Path outfilename, java.lang.String[] contents)
      The constructor stores the output file name and the contents to be written out
      TextFileWriter(java.lang.String dir, java.lang.String outname, double[] array)
      This constructor is used for debug when writing out a data array

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void appendToFile()
      This method is used to append text to the end of an existing log file.
      void writeOutArray()
      Writes out the data array for debug purposes, converting the numerics to text
      void writeOutToFile()
      This method writes out the text to the output file, with a newline inserted between each line of text.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextFileWriter

        public TextFileWriter(java.nio.file.Path outfilename,
                      java.lang.String[] contents)
        The constructor stores the output file name and the contents to be written out
        Parameters:
        outfilename - the output full path filename
        contents - the text contents to be written out

      • TextFileWriter

        public TextFileWriter(java.lang.String dir,
                      java.lang.String outname,
                      double[] array)
        This constructor is used for debug when writing out a data array
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory to write the file to
        outname - the name for the debug file
        array - the data array to write out

    • Method Detail

      • writeOutToFile

        public void writeOutToFile()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        This method writes out the text to the output file, with a newline inserted between each line of text.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if unable to write out to file

      • appendToFile

        public void appendToFile()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        This method is used to append text to the end of an existing log file. If no file exists, it is created.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if unable to write to file

      • writeOutArray

        public void writeOutArray()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Writes out the data array for debug purposes, converting the numerics to text
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if unable to write out to the file
